channel.title: Homes on Chaojie GU
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Chaojie GU

item.description: Biography My name is Chaojie Gu. I am currently a Ph.D. student in School of Computer Science and Engineering, Nanyang Technological University, Singapore. My research focuses on Internet of Things, Low Power Wide Area Networks. Previously, I received my B.Eng. degree from Harbin Institute of Technology in 2016.

item.title: Awards
item.description: Excellent Bachelor Thesis, Harbin Institute of Technology, 2016 National College Student Information Security Contest First Prize, PRC, 2015 National College Student Information Security Contest Third Prize, PRC, 2014

item.title: Teaching
item.description: Mentor, Final Year Projects (FYP) of undergraduates Nanyang Technological University, Singapore LOW ZHI REN LEONARD, 2016 ZHU JIAHUI, 2017 CHIA SU CHI FAITH, 2018 EILEEN TAY HUI LIAN, 2018 Nankai University, China SONG QUN, 2017-2018 Mentor, Visiting undergraduates Xi’an Jiaotong-Liverpool University, China DIXING XU, 2019 MENGYAO ZHENG, 2019

item.title: Miscellaneous
item.description: I am an amateur e-sports enthusiast Master player of PUBG Platinum player of Tom Clancy’s Rainbow Six Siege Master player of Teamfight Tactics Top tier SPG player (< 1%) of World of Tanks
